importHelp.title: 📝 Flashcard Import Guide
importHelp.description: Learn how to import multiple flashcards using a text file

format.title: 📄 File Format
description: - M: Media URL (image or audio link)
• Leave a blank line between cards

tips.title: 💡 Tips
description: • Make sure each card has both Q: and A:
• Use semicolons to separate multiple hints/examples
• Get Tag ID from `/flashcard tag list` command
• Media URLs must be publicly accessible
• Media Type must match the URL content

issues.title: ⚠️ Common Issues
description: • Missing required Q: or A: prefix

A: Your answer
